definition: a hairdresser who cuts hair and shaves beards as a trade, to perform the services of a barber: cut the hair and/or beard of
details:
noun
- a hairdresser who cuts hair and shaves beards as a trade
verb
- to perform the services of a barber: cut the hair and/or beard of
= example: to perform the services of a barber: cut the hair and/or beard of
